lessons.english: Nothing is as precious as love.

lessons.japanese: ご友情は私にはたいそう尊いものです。
lessons.english: Your friendship means much to me.

lessons.japanese: 川は美しいからといって尊いわけではない。
lessons.english: Just because a river is beautiful doesn't mean that it is precious.
Nothing is as precious as love.

lessons.japanese: 真の友情はお金より尊い。
lessons.english: A true friendship is more valuable than money.
